name: component as component
docstring: A component with style, event trigger and other props.

properties.name: event_triggers
properties.description: A mapping from event triggers to event chains.

properties.name: is_default
properties.description: Whether the import is default or named.

properties.name: key
properties.description: A unique key for the component.

properties.name: class_name
properties.description: The class name for the component.

properties.name: autofocus
properties.description: Whether the component should take the focus once the page is loaded

properties.name: State
properties.description: State class associated with this component instance
